attributes.title: 🧚🏼‍♀️✨I died getting this app✨🧚🏼‍♀️
attributes.review:
So first off, I saw this app and I love myself a good orange, so I downloaded it.  As soon as I opened the app, it notified me that I voted for our orange leader, you might ask yourself, “Emma?! How did you vote your underage?!” Well I didn’t, this Trump app made me, he’s trying to get all the votes even if it includes getting underage votes, but he’s trying to get all the votes he can because Kanye and Biden are very powerful, so he’s scared of losing.  But after it told me that I screamed, and the oranges came for me, they knocked on my door with guess who! Donald Trump!  Donald Trump and his orange minions were at my door and they had beers, he said “thank you Emma for voting for me, would you like to share a beer with me?” I was like “how do you know my name?!” He said “don’t worry about that” with a smirk on his face, also I can not drink because I am under age, and I told him that but he didn’t care, and so we had a beer.  My bunny Bella got harassed by the oranges, but after that happened I had enough so I said “got out of my house Donald your wife will be mad at you” and he said “ok fine I will go but only if you don’t tell my wife” I said ok.  But after that day one of his orange minions always came to visit me and my bunny.  (One of his orange minions, Harold, is in love with my bunny.)  He also told me that his hair, is actually a wig🤯😳.
Please do not get this app unless you want orange minions falling in love with your bunnies☺️
